Dreamspace: Dreaming your room space wit.4: Therefore, existing works for scene-level stylization either are not applicable for immersive indoor scenescale scenarios with affordable computation on HMD devices [2,18], cannot support semantic meaningful style generation [6, 7, 11, 22, 23, 56], or require well-structured CAD model instead of real-world reconstruction [49].
